title: Calories in Pinot Grigio
meta_description: Discover calories in pinot grigio per standard glass, including carbs, alcohol content, and nutrition breakdowns for this popular white wine.
assumptions: Standard 5 oz (150 ml) serving of dry Pinot Grigio wine, 12% ABV, no added sugars.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, vintage, alcohol content, sweetness level, and serving size. Check bottle labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 150 ml glass of dry Pinot Grigio contains about 123 kcal, mostly from alcohol and minimal carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Off-dry version (slightly sweeter, +2 g sugars per glass)

faqs.q: How many calories in one glass of pinot grigio?
faqs.a: About 123 kcal for a standard 150 ml glass of dry Pinot Grigio.
Yes, around 3.8 g carbs per 150 ml glass, mostly from residual sugars.

faqs.q: Calories in pinot grigio vs other white wines?
faqs.a: Similar to Sauvignon Blanc (120-130 kcal/glass); sweeter wines like Riesling may have more.

faqs.q: Is pinot grigio low in sodium?
faqs.a: Very low, about 7 mg per glass, with no fat or cholesterol.

faqs.q: How does serving size affect calories in pinot grigio?
faqs.a: Calories scale with volume; a 5 oz glass is 123 kcal, while 6 oz is about 148 kcal.
